result.purpose: This folder contains repository interfaces and implementations for managing various entities in the application, including announcements, code versions, contracts, and user preferences.
result.architecture: The folder follows a repository pattern, encapsulating data access logic and providing a clean interface for interacting with the underlying data sources.

repositories/announcement.go.purpose: This file defines the repository interface for managing announcements in the application.

repositories/code_version.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing code version records in a database.

repositories/common.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing common entities in a database.

repositories/contract.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing contract data in a database.

repositories/dapp.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing decentralized application (DApp) data.

repositories/highlight.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing highlights in a database using GORM.

repositories/init.go.purpose: Provides pagination functionality for database queries using GORM.

repositories/network.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing network data in a database.

repositories/preference.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing user preferences in a database using GORM.

repositories/quickaccess.go.purpose: This file defines a repository interface and implementation for managing Quick Access DApps in a database.

repositories/trusted_domain.go.purpose: This file defines a repository interface and implementation for managing trusted domains in a database.
